articles.title: Managing Notre Dame’s Bountiful Roster - 247Sports
articles.description: The plan was to make the back half of the roster more productive. It started defensively. It’s continued on offense. The Irish are using numerous players to their advantage.

articles.title: Red Sox, Eduardo Rodriguez Avoid Arbitration - MLB Trade Rumors
articles.description: The Red Sox signed Eduardo Rodriguez to a one-year contract for 2021, avoiding his final trip through arbitration. Read more at MLB Trade Rumors.
